casebody.data:
HOLLY et al., Respondents, v. MANHATTAN RY. CO., Appellant. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. May 7, 1894.) Appeal from equity term. Action by Henry R. Holly and others against the Manhattan Railway Company.

Argued before SEDGWICK, C. J„ and FREEDMAN and McADAM, JJ.

Davies, Short & Townsend, for appellant Cannon & Atwater, for respondents. PER CURIAM.

The judgment should be affirmed, with costs.
